description: This file contains the implementation of the NoteService class, which provides methods for creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting notes within the application. It orchestrates interactions with the note repository and handles validation and logging.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Implements note management operations such as creation, retrieval, listing, updating, and deletion, acting as an orchestrator between validation, logging, and the repository.

methods.name: CreateAsync
methods.description: Creates a new note with the specified owner, title, and content, then saves it via the repository.

methods.name: GetAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID and owner.

methods.name: ListAsync
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of notes for the specified owner along with the total count.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Updates the title and content of an existing note if found, then saves the changes.

methods.name: DeleteAsync
methods.description: Removes a note by its ID and owner, returning a boolean indicating success.
